column4: I want screen to start after my computer reboots, I want it to start certain things like rtorrent, irssi and "msn" ( msn is aliases for bitlbee -c /home/user/.conf) Therefore I need 1) alieses to work in screen 2) Screen to start at boot, so I can just SSH and resume my things after reboot
I want screen to start with certain applications at boot, could someone please assist me with that
I want screen to start with certain applications at boot, could someone please assist me with that. Like irssi and rtorrent after boot
